text: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold is a 1986 American Israeli adventure comedy movie directed by Gary Nelson and is loosely based on the 1887 novel Allan Quatermain by H. Rider Haggard. It is the sequel to King Solomon's Mines. It stars Sharon Stone, Richard Chamberlain, James Earl Jones, Henry Silva, Robert Donner, Larbi Doghmi, Cassandra Peterson and was distributed by Cannon Films. It was a box office disappointment. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Israeli movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set in the 1910s
title: Allan Quatermain and the Lost City of Gold
